escort.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to take someone somewhere, especially when you are protecting or guarding them
escort.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The shipment was escorted by guards.

escort.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to go with someone and show them a place

escort.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to go with someone to a social event

escort.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a person or a group of people or vehicles that go with someone in order to protect or guard them
escort.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He was driven away to prison under armed escort  (=protected or guarded by an escort).
